title: Analysis of Cognitive Biases in Language Structure and Repetitive Learning Paradigms

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Learners perform group language data analysis and distortion reproduction experiments, receiving summative evaluation through final deliverables

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mechanisms of cognitive biases influencing language structure formation.
Learners can simulate Zipfian word distribution changes by applying iterative learning paradigms.
Learners can measure entropy reduction phenomena occurring in collective language transmission processes using data analysis tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
